title: Cyberpunk 2077 Hits 1 Million Daily Players - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.22.22
description:
Cyberpunk 2077 has how many players?! Is Edgerunners the game's savior or are these numbers temporary? Blessing is joined by special guest Funke Joseph to talk about Cyberpunk, Videogamedunkey's new indie publishing company, and the upcoming Mario movie teaser.

Time Stamps - 
﻿00:00:00 - Start
00:09:04 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our Mario Rabbids Sparks of Hope preview. That’s Greg, Mike, Andy, and Parris talking about their time with the game. And if that’s not enough, the post show for that one is a chaotic round of Kinda Feudy that you don’t wanna miss. That’s up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames


Over on Youtube.com/KindaFunny our Screencast for She Hulk is up

The Roper Report  -

00:11:00 - Cyberpunk’s resurgence continues with a million players a day
00:21:16 - Gaming YouTuber Dunkey Sets Up an Indie Game Publishing Company
00:36:13 - Ad
00:38:21 - A new game developer approaches!
00:43:00 - We have a date for the first Mario movie teaser trailer
00:47:08 - Splinter Cell Remake Will Update the Story 'for a Modern-Day Audience'
00:53:07 - Microsoft’s CEO says he’s ‘very confident’ the Activision deal will gain approval
01:00:32 - Dying Light 2’s first story DLC has been delayed again
01:01:35 - Out today
01:03:16 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Carli Velocci formerly Windows Central
